Member Guest 144
Member Guest 154
Putting Green
Events & Celebrations
Special Events Made Even More Special
From special events and parties to weddings and receptions, let our team of experts work with you to plan your special event. Miles Grant Country Club offers all the atmosphere you expect at a country club, including a welcoming dining room with great sunset views, beautifully presented and delectable cuisine, two dance floors, a great sound system and a staff who are anxious to please. We’ll do whatever we can to make your event exactly what you envision. We can create the right atmosphere with a menu and beverages that suit any occasion. Maybe you’d enjoy listening to our player piano during a cocktail hour, or screen a film or photo montage with our projector. We also have a covered patio and gazebo where we can set up a portable bar for your outdoor enjoyment.
Events and Meetings
Weddings & Banquets
Private Parties
Tab panes
Events and Meetings
At Miles Grant Country Club, we can combine your special events with the use of our outstanding club facilities, such as creating a golf outing, a fun tennis tournament, or a pool party. We offer a variety of customized additions to make your event thoroughly entertaining for all your guests. There are no required packages and no set menus. We’ll work with you to design an event that will exceed your expectations without exceeding your budget.
Weddings & Banquets
We’ll gladly meet with you and your planner on the details of your special wedding events, from bachelor and bachelorette parties and rehearsal dinners, through the ceremony and reception, to a family brunch the next day.
Private Parties
The event staff at Miles Grant Country Club takes pride in creating unique special occasions. We believe in personal attention and individualized details. If there’s a special reason to celebrate, we want the celebration to be special, too. There are no required packages and no set menus. We can help you plan special events such as a milestone birthday or anniversary celebration. Miles Grant can create an intimate setting for a small group, or accommodate up to 300.

Membership Options at Miles Grant Country Club in Stuart, Florida
MGCC Annual Membership
MGCC Summer Membership Applications
Tab panes
MGCC Annual Membership
There are a number of Annual Membership options available at Miles Grant Country Club. These Memberships are available to those who live at Miles Grant as well as others who would like to participate in Miles Grant activities such as golf, tennis, bocce ball, meals and planned evening events such as Trivia Night. See the Calendar for the schedule of activities at Miles Grant Country Club.
Annual Memberships available:
Annual Social
2025 SOCIAL MEMBERSHIP  APPLICATION FORM
Golf
Platinum (Annual)
Gold (Afternoon)
Silver (Weekend)
2025 GOLF  PRIVILEGE APPLICATION FORM (with Social Membership)
2025 GOLF  PRIVILEGE APPLICATION FORM
Tennis
Annual
2025 TENNIS PRIVILEGE APPLICATION FORM
Contact the Club Office if you have questions about Membership in the Miles Grant Country Club by calling 772-286-2220, ext. 108
MGCC Summer Membership Applications
Summer Memberships run from
April 26th - September 30th
Contact the Membership Office if you have any questions about Summer Membership by calling 772-286-2220 ext. 108.
Application Forms
2025 Summer Golf Application
2025 Summer Social Membership Application
2025 Summer Tennis Application
2025 Summer Memberships Application
We would love to have you join us as a member!
